original: Linder, Karl Jonatan, komiminister^ Smålands Häliinge, f. 10/10/77 i Karl- stad. G. 07 m, Signhild Malniigren. Barn: Vera f. 08, Oiov 11. — Mo’g:ex. i Karlstad 96, teol. fil. ex. i Upps. 98, teor. teol. ex. 02, prästv. f. Karlstads stift 03. Tjg. s. pastradj. i Dalby, v. pastor i Dals-Ed samt v. kom,min. i Köla o. Brunskog, kommin. i Mang-skog 07, v. pastor i Köla 21-23, kommin. i Näsby sed. 27, v. fl. tillf, för-ordn. s. v. pastor o. v. kommin. i Vetlanda samt s. v. pastor i Bäckseda. Ordf. i komm istämma, kommind, kyrkostämma, kyrkoråd, fattigv :styr., barnavind, skolråd, dir. f. Bäckseda-Näsby kommiförb.
translated: Linder, Karl Jonatan, assistant minister^ from Småland's Häliinge, born on 10/10/77 in Karlstad. Married in 1907 to Signhild Malnigren. Children: Vera, born in 1908, Olov in 1911. Divorced in Karlstad in 1896. Received a theological bachelor's degree in Uppsala in 1898, a theoretical theological degree in 1902, and was ordained as a priest for Karlstad diocese in 1903. Served as a curate in Dalby, vicar in Dals-Ed, and assistant minister in Köla and Brunskog. Became assistant minister in Mangskog in 1907, then vicar in Köla from 1921 to 1923. Became assistant minister in Näsby in 1927 and served temporarily as both vicar and assistant minister in Vetlanda and Bäckseda. Served as chairman in the parish assembly, local government assembly, church council, poor relief board, childcare board, school council, and director of the Bäckseda-Näsby municipal association.

education.description: Theological Bachelor's degree from Uppsala University
